name: Venu AI
headline: Build your community with Venu AI
description: Build your community with Venu AI, the community building, B2B connections, and event marketing platform for enterprise.
tags: industry:b2b; industry:community; industry:sales; industry:marketing; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Jeremy Lam, Founder
founders.description: Automate community building and build self-sustaining top of funnel sales outbound using podcasts, webinars, meetups, and conferences.

founders.name: Nanette Jackson, Founder
founders.description: Currently, I am the COO of Wvrld Studios Inc., whose objective is to bring people together in Virtual Reality (VR). Our exciting new VR application is VENU, allowing events professionals to host B2B or B2C  trade shows, expositions, conferences, or events online in 3-D from Windows, Mac, or VR headset.

founders.name: Patrick Nguyen, Founder
founders.description: Software developer, technical and multiplatform support for Venu.

generated_description:
**Venu AI: Building Communities through Technology**

Founded in 2016 and part of Y Combinator's Winter 2021 batch, Venu AI is a budding company located in San Jose, California. With a lean team of just five employees, they tackle the ambitious mission of helping businesses build their communities. Their platform focuses on B2B connections and event marketing, making it a robust tool for enterprise-level clients.

At its core, Venu AI aims to automate community building—transforming the often tedious process into something efficient and effective. They’ve designed their system to achieve impressive results for sales teams; we’re talking numbers like a 40% response rate, 30 qualified sales calls in thirty days, and a self-sustaining sales pipeline that sees ten new paying customers every month. Imagine achieving tenfold results with none of the hassle of traditional sales methods. 

Their clientele includes some heavyweight names like Microsoft, Walmart, and Accenture, showcasing their credibility in the market. The testimonials from these industry leaders add a layer of trust for potential customers and partners, reinforcing that this is a platform not to be overlooked.

Venu AI harnesses AI-powered matchmaking to create personalized outreach, automating the grunt work that sales teams usually dread. The key? Connecting face-to-face with prospects through automated events like webinars and conferences, facilitating those crucial networking opportunities that can lead to closed deals.

Accessible through their [website](https://www.venu3d.com), Venu AI is not just about offering a service; it’s about revolutionizing how communities—and the businesses within them—engage, connect, and grow. If you find yourself struggling to book those sales calls or feel like your outreach is falling on deaf ears, Venu AI promises a pathway to revitalizing your approach through technology.

In summary, whether you’re looking to enhance your sales pipeline or strengthen community ties, Venu AI claims to have the tools to help you get there—efficiently, effectively, and with AI-powered ingenuity.
